snippet: The program has always included restored and rediscovered older films-classics as well as curios-alongside the newest Cannes prize winners and Academy Award aspirants.

headline.main: Telluride Film Festival: Geoff Dyer, Tarkovsky's 'Stalker,' Chaplin and More
